Posts.Content: wonderwoman57 wrote: Hello new friends! I am currently in cancer remission from endometrial cancer for 4years as if 9/3/17. Unfortunately, it moved to my colon so I am a double pouch recipient. I also had to deal with a nasty recto/vaginal fistula that could not be fixed. In spite of this, several hospital stays, 2 which were a month long each.But..I have made an amazing come back., However ,ealier this week on Monday,Today is Saturday I've discovered an angry red patch the the size of a 50Â¢ piece under right breast. There's no dimpling or inverted nipple on that side. There's no orange peel. Just a couple of tiny marks. It itches very little. When I found it, I googled and discovered IBC might be the culprit. I have an apt to see my OBGYN on the 30th. Is there anyone out there who's had a cervical cancer that has come back as IBC? Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: IBC concerns wonderwoman57 Moderators
